Text: Phone: Pam param pam param...
Gregory: "Chief?"
Chief: WHY AREN'T YOU AT SOUNDCHECK YET?! Concert in 2 hours!”
Gregory: "WHAAAT?! But no one told me that…”
Chief: “Chill I'm just kidding, who the hell need a soundcheck? Do we look like pop-rock jerks?”
Gregory: “…”
Chief: Anyway, bring your ass here and don’t be late
Gregory: "But..."
Phone: “Boop, boop, boop…”
Gregory: “…”
1 hour later
Gregory: Wow! It is really huge croud(20 drunk bodies)@Gotta figure out how to warm them up
You're trying to sing some notes with the hall. However, a crowd of drunken dead metallists is not the best choice to sing with.
You are furiously growl-yodeling at the crowd. That’s super effective!
You already get a taste, you start to fuck on the guitar like a mad devil
Banger time! Your main hit is "Absolute Death". Fans are waiting for the tooth guitar, don't screw it up!
TEETH GUITAR GAME
You broke almost all the strings, you Idiot!
Yes, you did it@But what did it cost?
A hater got on the stage, it seems he wants to make a couple of critical arguments
HATER GAME
He beat you to a pulp and took the microphone.@Looks like he's a new soloist now.@The world of metal is truly cruel
Damn, looks like it was a drunk fan.@K, throw it somewhere under the stage, we need to finish the concert
Everything is going absolutely great!@The crowd raising their hands and chanting
Crowd: "DDD ... DDD ... DDD"
Wait... What are you doing?!!!
JUMP GAME
You fell down, you were trampled on, no one even noticed your absence.
You were caught, but some crackpot tore out a tuft of your hair.@Hey, be happy you're still alive!
Some time after the perfomance
This. Just. Fucking cool
Listen don't you wanna join us for all the time?
And what about the previous soloist?
Oh don't worry, after 2 weeks in the hospital he said "this job is too stressful for him"
Meh... I always knew he just a little pussy
Anyway what's your decision?
I'm sorry.. You know, this is not actually  kind of job I looked for...
Become a rock star or stay a janitor, he-he, who else has that choice"@Okay fuck it, I'm in, bitches!
